name: New Tab To-Do List (please change)
description: Chrome Extension to keep track of To-Dos in new tabs.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:; font-src * 'self';
